name: Escape from the Astro Belt
description:
It's a simple game that I made for fun. 

WASD to move and C to crouch.

Pressing E while moving will warp you toward the direction you are currently moving.

Get coins by dodging objects that come at you from the back and meteorites that fall from above. Coins = points. The location of the coins changes every 15 seconds. (It doesn't matter if you miss it.)

There are difficulty levels ranging from easy to impossible.

Your best score will be recorded (and will disappear if you leave the browser!!!) 10 points is the maximum.

ENJOY!!
